sect1.title: Previous Exceptions
sect1.para: Since Zend Framework 1.10, Zend_Exception implements the PHP 5.3 support for previous exceptions. Simply put, when in a catch() block, you can throw a new exception that references the original exception, which helps provide additional context when debugging. By providing this support in Zend Framework, your code may now be forwards compatible with PHP 5.3.
Previous exceptions are indicated as the third argument to an exception constructor.
